mapper.insert: insert into blli_posting_test(posting_url, posting_title, posting_photo_link, posting_media_count, posting_content, posting_summary, small_product, posting_author, posting_date) values(#{postingUrl}, #{postingTitle}, #{postingPhotoLink}, #{postingMediaCount}, #{postingContent}, #{postingSummary}, #{smallProduct}, #{postingAuthor}, #{postingDate})
mapper.select: select posting_url, posting_title, posting_photo_link, posting_summary, posting_score, small_product, posting_scrape_count, posting_like_count, posting_dislike_count, posting_author, to_char(posting_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') as posting_date from blli_posting_test where small_product like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
